name: Add a task in Asana when a Shopify order is created
description: Stay on top of new business and avoid backlogs by tracking, organizing, and managing your Shopify orders as they come in. This template will add a task in Asana when a customer places a Shopify order. You and your team can start fulfilling orders immediately rather than losing time with manual administrative tasks.
